Description: Bone amulet in the form of a jackal.
Curator's comments: Published: A. Roveri and F. Tiradritte [eds.], Kemet: Alle Sorgenti del Tempo, Ravenna 1998, p.176 [104].
Bibliographic references: Brunton 1937 / Mostagedda and the Tasian Culture (p. 86, pl. XLIII.28)
Exhibition history: 2012, Apr-Aug. New York, The Metropolitan Museum of Art, Art of Early Egypt.
